description.text:
Ah the King of Dragons was here...no wonder we could never claim his soul...
I have grown quit fond of you, Mortal -the Pixie says with a monotone voice- 
I'll be collecting your soul when it's time...See you on the other side...
 Ow you will die, I bet my name on it, mortal! It's your destiny...

description.translate:
You...defeated him!...As promised...-the pixie whispers her name in your ear-...be kind to me, Mortal.
 If we find the Elytra your soul will be your own again...
